Name: WRC FIA World Rally Championship
Overview: Official locations, official rally cars and official drivers - everything in WRC FIA World Rally Championship is designed to give the player the full experience of taking part in one of the most ferocious and challenging motorsports. WRC FIA World Rally Championship features "Road to the WRC", an unrivalled career mode that will allow players to hit the dirt to win the ultimate championship. With advanced car tuning, stunning car damage effects and the opportunity to race against heroes of the sport, WRC FIA World Rally Championship is the closest you can get to being one of the most skilled and fearless drivers in the world
